title: [1.13-1.7.10][Tea And Biscuits——茶和饼干]茶，饼干，茶饼干
txt_content:
本帖最后由 2173204318 于 2019-6-15 14:51 编辑 


茶和饼干
Tea And Biscuits

 本MOD有什么用？
增加茶 饼干 分类物品 让玩家更好的游戏 1.13需要rift

关于授权
提交给作者 等待作者回复 
关于汉化
汉化不完全 饼干类未汉化
望大佬帮忙汉化.....
目前汉化 请至附件
    "item.teaandbiscuits.nice": "Nice",    "item.teaandbiscuits.pick_up": "Pick Up",    "item.teaandbiscuits.digestive": "Digestive",    "item.teaandbiscuits.digestive_chocolate": "Chocolate Digestive",    "item.teaandbiscuits.jd_dipped": "Jammy Dodger Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.cb_dipped": "Chocolate Bourbon Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.mm_dipped": "Malted Milk Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.nice_dipped": "Nice Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.ginger_nut_dipped": "Ginger Nut Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.pick_up_dipped": "Pick Up Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.rich_tea_dipped": "Rich Tea Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.digestive_dipped": "Digestive Dipped",    "item.teaandbiscuits.digestive_chocolate_dipped": "Chocolate Digestive Dipped"    "item.teaandbiscuits.jd": "Jammy Dodger",

replies.txt_content: 请问有支持Rift的小地图吗/？

replies.author: MC_PEP
replies.txt_content: 这个中文汉化放在哪里?

replies.author: FlowerFall
replies.txt_content: 这个茶跟pam's或者茶道工艺，和风之类的冲突吗？

FlowerFall 发表于 2019-2-1 21:08
这个茶跟pam's或者茶道工艺，和风之类的冲突吗？

replies.author: MCdie_die
replies.txt_content: 来休闲一天的闲暇的下午茶吧！！！！！

replies.author: 灰喵哼唧唧
replies.txt_content: 求问，它能立体放置在桌子上么？

replies.author: 悠然0212
replies.txt_content: 又是一个可以再MINecraft里当个吃货的mod

replies.author: 久故i
replies.txt_content: 你这个茶道让我这个绿茶很爱啊滑稽
